trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click> event is raised when a link button in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>é gerado quando um botão de link em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>controle é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the BulletedListEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância da classe BulletedListEventArgs, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial, uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>

| Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs.Index%2A>| O valor de `index` parâmetro. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs.Index%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the list item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero do item da lista em uma <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> que gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the list item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice do item da lista em uma <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> controle que disparou o evento.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to programmatically access the index of the list item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Use essa propriedade para acessar o índice do item na lista de forma programática um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>controle que disparou o evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: The index of the list item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: O índice do item da lista em uma <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref> controle que disparou o evento.
